item.title: How to Use Tallow Balm on a Baby: A Natural Skincare Routine
item.description: How to Use Tallow Balm on a Baby Babies have delicate, sensitive skin, which can become dry, irritated, or rash-prone. Tallow balm NZ is a natural, safe way to keep your baby’s skin soft, hydrated, and protected. Here’s how to use it. 1. For Everyday Moisturising ✔ Apply a small amount after bath time. ✔ Massage gently into baby’s skin to lock in moisture. ✔ Use daily to prevent dryness.
